message:
Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe holds immense value for you. Given your keen interest and the significant benefit this product would bring to you, I am extending a special offer.

I propose to sell the product to you for $1,250,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic worth to me and its perceived value to you, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. I am more than happy to discuss further details or negotiate terms that might make this deal even more attractive for both parties.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice
